### Now you've completed your application

You can print your application off and send it by post or email it to us. Our email is [tec@justice.gov.uk](tec@justice.gov.uk).

**Post your application**
 
Traffic Enforcement Centre   
County Court Business Centre   
St Katherine’s House      
21 – 27 St Katherine’s Street   
Northampton, NN1 2LH
